name: Space Raiders (itch) (Shadowkatt21)
description:
This is a 2D space shooter called Space Raiders.

Some changes I made of my own are as follows:

- I added a short story to accompany the player.

- Redesigned the sprite design of the enemies and players. I also added a new design to the menus.

- Added health upgrade. This increases your health by 3 every round.

- Added a minimap. (The minimap UI might be the wrong size in the WebGL game)

Created by Alex Botez at ShadowInc
